name: Check area clear of all other trades and their materials
Have moisture readings been taken or is it required
Surface is clean, dry, and free from dust, debris or contaminants
Does floor have U3 finish (3mm variance over 3m)
Are there any cracks that require remediation?
Apply Floor Levelling Compound or ramping (Has this been allowed for? - Check with Project Supervisor)
SEND TO CLIENT FOR QUALITY APPROVAL
